backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods or logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing recent frontend feature additions and associated files.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file summarizing various frontend components and utilities for build reference.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Guide explaining how to deploy the app to Internet Computer mainnet.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining light/dark themes with custom OKLCH color variables.
frontend/index.html: App entry HTML loading root container and AdSense script.
frontend/public/ads.txt: Single-line ads.txt entry for Google AdSense verification.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main router component controlling page state and rendering all tool pages including Daily Utilities.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Shared layout with header, back navigation, ad banners, and footer attribution link.
frontend/src/components/ImagePreview.tsx: Component showing original and resized image previews with dimensions.
frontend/src/components/QrPreview.tsx: Canvas-based QR matrix renderer for QR previews.
frontend/src/components/WrappingTabsHead: Responsive wrapping tab header component for tabbed tool pages.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and refreshing the backend actor based on Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity login, state, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Returns an empty object placeholder for frontend-only query hooks.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS layers and custom CSS variables for light and dark theme color palettes.
frontend/src/lib/clipboard.ts: Implements a clipboard copy helper with toast notifications for success or failure.
frontend/src/lib/dailyUtilities.ts: Includes time zone constants and utilities for duration formatting, stopwatch, countdowns, pomodoro state, alarms, and time zone comparison.
frontend/src/lib/image.ts: Resizes an image via canvas and returns a blob URL of the resized output.
frontend/src/lib/names.ts: Generates random first, last, or full names using predefined name lists with duplicate avoidance.
frontend/src/lib/numberTools.ts: Provides number and date utilities including percentages, tip and split bill calculations, age and date differences, and time parsing.
frontend/src/lib/password.ts: Generates secure passwords based on selected character sets using crypto‑based randomness.
frontend/src/lib/qr.ts: Creates a simple QR-like boolean matrix with basic finder and timing patterns based on input text.
frontend/src/lib/textTools.ts: Provides text transformation utilities, text statistics calculation, line sorting/deduping, slug generation, and lorem ipsum generation.
frontend/src/lib/units.ts: Defines unit conversion categories and unit definitions for length, weight, temperature, and volume with conversion formulas.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and renders the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/DailyUtilitiesPage.ts: Implements timers, stopwatch, pomodoro, alarms, time zones, calendar generation, and shift calculator UI using dailyUtilities helpers.
frontend/src/pages/HubPage.tsx: Displays a navigation hub of tool categories with cards that route users to major tool sections.
frontend/src/pages/ImageResizerPage.tsx: Handles image upload, maintains resizing settings, performs client‑side image resizing, and enables preview and download.
frontend/src/pages/NumberConversionTools: Provides calculators for percentages, tips, age, dates, time, unit conversion, base conversion, currency conversion, and random number generation.
frontend/src/pages/PasswordPage.tsx: Renders a password generator with configurable character options, length, and copy-to-clipboard support. Handles UI state for toggles, generation, and validation.
frontend/src/pages/PopularToolsPage.tsx: Combines multiple utilities including QR generation, password generation, image resizing, unit conversion, and random name generation into a single page with shared state. Updates outputs reactively based on user inputs and tool-specific logic.
frontend/src/pages/QrCodePage.tsx: Provides a simple QR code generator that converts user input into a QR matrix and allows downloading the generated code as an image. Handles input validation and error display.
frontend/src/pages/RandomNamePage.tsx: Generates random names based on count and style, with options to copy individual or all names. Manages list rendering and clipboard interactions.
Implements a suite of text utilities including case conversion, counting, sorting, slug creation, lorem ipsum generation, and hashtag generation. Manages separate inputs and outputs for each tool within a tabbed interface.
frontend/src/pages/UnitConverterPage.tsx: React page that renders a unit converter UI, manages category/unit selection, and performs live conversions using the convert() utility.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config extending theme colors, container settings, animations, and enabling typography, container queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing features, architecture notes, and known issues for a micro tools hub application.
